internal.content: --- title: "Install the Operator" date: 2022-11-03T10:57:46+01:00 weight: 24 --- ## üöÄ TASK: Install the Operator üåè Documentation for the Task: Online starter installation of CP4WAIOPS Next you have to install the CP4WAIOPS Operator by creating the `Subscription` as described in the Documentation. 1. Run the following command: ```yaml cat << EOF | oc apply -f - apiVersion: operators.coreos.com/v1alpha1 kind: Subscription metadata: name: ibm-aiops-orchestrator namespace: cp4waiops spec: channel: v3.6 installPlanApproval: Automatic name: ibm-aiops-orchestrator source: ibm-operator-catalog sourceNamespace: openshift-marketplace EOF This creates the Operator Instance via the `Subscription` that will be looking for an `Installation` definition and start the installation if it exists (you will create this in one of the next steps).
